body: On Twitter, Egyptian Ahmed Sabry writes (Ar): "The Egyptian government detains Salafists, Christians, Satan worshipers, activists, gays, seculars, communists and atheists. Only the vegetarians are left."
original_body: On Twitter, Egyptian Ahmed Sabry writes (Ar): "The Egyptian government detains Salafists, Christians, Satan worshipers, activists, gays, seculars, communists and atheists. Only the vegetarians are left."
title: Egypt: Who's Who of Who's in Jail
